original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhū nibbānapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhū nibbāna paṭisayuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaseti

original: Tedha bhikkhū aṭṭhiṁ katvā, manasi katvā, sabbaṁ cetaso samannāharitvā, ohitasotā dhammaṁ suṇanti.
analyzed: te idha bhikkhū aṭṭhim katvā manasi katvā sabbam cetasaḥ samannāharitvā ohita sotāḥ dhammam suṇanti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi
atthi bhikkhave a jātam a bhūtam a katam

original: No cetaṁ, bhikkhave, abhavissa ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhataṁ, nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyetha.
analyzed: no ceta bhikkhave abhavissa a jātam a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhata na yidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇam paññāyetha

original: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi ajātaṁ abhūtaṁ akataṁ asaṅkhataṁ, tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṁ paññāyatī”ti.
analyzed: yasmā ca kho bhikkhave atthi a jātam a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhata tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇam paññāyati iti
